title: My account is permabanned?!?
body: I came back to play league after one year, but before that it was never banned. I left before Kindred came out. After coming back, I tried logging in but the account password was changed, which was weird because I never received any emails saying for a request. After changing my password, I see this screen where it said I was permabanned, and I don't recognize the chat was given to me before I was banned. I don't know if it is possible but can you unban my account?

replies.body: Probably someone hacked your account and acting ridiculously toxic on it. Which got you banned.

You can try sending in a ticket to Riot support [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) asking if they can do anything. But I wouldn't get your hopes up too much, account security is on the account owners head. Might be a chance that they reverse it if you can prove it wasn't you. Good luck with your account.
riot only wants your money, they dont give a fuck about you
